attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We would like to petition the Prime Minister to intervene in our dispute with the Belfast Edcuation Board of Northern Ireland to hold an audit in our area of Sydenham East Belfast under Section 75 of the Northern Ireland Act1998, to provide Better Youth Services in Sydenham and reverse their decision to dispose of the Sydenham Youth Club Palmerston Road Belfast Northern Ireland

rejection.details: This is a devolved matter and should be directed to the Scottish Executive / Welsh Assembly / Northern Ireland Executive as appropriate.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
